title: 我这一个电脑配置怎样？
author: Chikerenaham
txt_content:
我这一个电脑配置怎样啊？

CPU: Intel Pentium G3258 3.2GHz Dual-Core Processor ($69.98 @ OutletPC) 
CPU Cooler: Cooler Master Hyper 212 EVO 82.9 CFM Sleeve Bearing CPU Cooler ($29.98 @ OutletPC) 
Motherboard: ASRock Z97 Anniversary ATX LGA1150 Motherboard ($88.99 @ SuperBiiz) 
Memory: Team Zeus Yellow 8GB (2 x 4GB) DDR3-1600 Memory ($67.99 @ Newegg) 
Storage: Seagate Barracuda 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive ($53.98 @ OutletPC) 
Video Card: PowerColor Radeon R9 280X 3GB Video Card ($208.98 @ Newegg) 
Case: NZXT Source 210 Window ATX Mid Tower Case ($51.98 @ Newegg) 
Power Supply: EVGA 600B 600W 80+ Bronze Certified ATX Power Supply ($39.99 @ Newegg) 
Total: $611.87
Prices include shipping, taxes, and discounts when available
Generated by PCPartPicker 2014-11-02 04:30 EST-0500

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content: 好屌的样子...开光影没问题吧
配置不行呀，g3258CPU的级别等于i3

奔腾 3.2 老了点外
R9 280X买的明智
显卡不错 性价比高  
处理器还行 能应付大多数本世代游戏（基本上没有多少款游戏可以把双核跑满一般的）
内存就不说了  基本上8G 够用了 

PS LZ的280X 才67刀！ 哪里买的啊！老司机求代购

replies.author: Ceylon
replies.txt_content: 渣CPU配个双通道几个意思。。。

replies.author: 銀河灬領主
replies.txt_content: 显卡好评,光影肯定没问题了

replies.author: MC麒麟
replies.txt_content: 不懂配置，这真的是你电脑啊

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 叁只番茄
replies.txt_content:
说实话楼主这个搭配性价比是很高的_(:з」∠)_
G3258+Z97主板 比I系列低了三分之一的价格 超频以后性能赶得上i7_(:з」∠)_
显卡r9 290x也很不错了
买买买买买！
